languages.text: {n}Паскаль торжественно чеканит, сопровождая каждое слово бинарными командами:{/n} "Словом первым своим данная единица сообщает, что угроза безопасности высшего обсерваториума отсутствует. Словом вторым своим данная единица повелевает восстановить работу лифтовой системы. Словом третьим своим данная единица подтверждает свое право отдать сей приказ".

{n}Pasqal enunciates solemnly, accompanying each word with binharic commands,{/n} "As its first pronouncement, this unit declares that no security threat to the high observatorium is present. As its second pronouncement, this unit orders the operation of the lift system to be restored. As its third pronouncement, this unit confirms its authorisation to issue that order."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль торжественно чеканит, сопровождая каждое слово бинарными командами:{/n} "Словом первым своим данная единица сообщает, что угроза безопасности высшего обсерваториума отсутствует. Словом вторым своим данная единица повелевает восстановить работу лифтовой системы. Словом третьим своим данная единица подтверждает свое право отдать сей приказ".

As its second pronouncement, this unit orders the operation of the lift system to be restored. As its third pronouncement, this unit confirms its authorisation to issue that order."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルは言葉のひとつひとつにビンハリックコマンドを入れながら、厳かな空気で明瞭に発音する。{/n}「第一宣告、当ユニットは上級観察室の安全を脅かすものはないと宣言する。第二宣告、当ユニットはリフト系統の復旧作業を命じる。第三宣告、当ユニットは当該命令を下す権限を付与されていることを確認する」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal enunciates solemnly, accompanying each word with binharic commands,{/n} "As its first pronouncement, this unit declares that no security threat to the high observatorium is present. As its second pronouncement, this unit orders the operation of the lift system to be restored. As its third pronouncement, this unit confirms its authorisation to issue that order."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは言葉のひとつひとつにビンハリックコマンドを入れながら、厳かな空気で明瞭に発音する。{/n}「第一宣告、当ユニットは上級観察室の安全を脅かすものはないと宣言する。第二宣告、当ユニットはリフト系統の復旧作業を命じる。第三宣告、当ユニットは当該命令を下す権限を付与されていることを確認する」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡以郑重的二进制语气下了命令。{/n}“本单位下达第一个指令，宣布至高瞭望台不存在安全威胁。第二个指令，恢复电梯系统的运行。第三个指令，确认本单位有权发布该命令。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal enunciates solemnly, accompanying each word with binharic commands,{/n} "As its first pronouncement, this unit declares that no security threat to the high observatorium is present. As its second pronouncement, this unit orders the operation of the lift system to be restored. As its third pronouncement, this unit confirms its authorisation to issue that order."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡以郑重的二进制语气下了命令。{/n}“本单位下达第一个指令，宣布至高瞭望台不存在安全威胁。第二个指令，恢复电梯系统的运行。第三个指令，确认本单位有权发布该命令。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal entonne une litanie solennelle tout en accompagnant chacun de ses mots de commandes binhaires :{/n} « Première proclamation : cette unité déclare qu'aucune menace ne pèse actuellement sur l'observatorium. Deuxième proclamation : cette unité ordonne la restauration du système de l'ascenseur. Troisième proclamation : cette unité confirme avoir l'autorisation de donner un tel ordre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal enunciates solemnly, accompanying each word with binharic commands,{/n} "As its first pronouncement, this unit declares that no security threat to the high observatorium is present. As its second pronouncement, this unit orders the operation of the lift system to be restored. As its third pronouncement, this unit confirms its authorisation to issue that order."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal entonne une litanie solennelle tout en accompagnant chacun de ses mots de commandes binhaires :{/n} « Première proclamation : cette unité déclare qu'aucune menace ne pèse actuellement sur l'observatorium. Deuxième proclamation : cette unité ordonne la restauration du système de l'ascenseur. Troisième proclamation : cette unité confirme avoir l'autorisation de donner un tel ordre. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal enuncia solemnemente, acompañando cada palabra con comandos binarios:{/n} «Como primera declaración, esta unidad confirma que no existe ninguna amenaza de seguridad en este observatorium. Como segunda declaración, esta unidad ordena la activación del sistema de ascensores. Como tercera declaración, esta unidad confirma la autorización para emitir la orden anterior».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal enunciates solemnly, accompanying each word with binharic commands,{/n} "As its first pronouncement, this unit declares that no security threat to the high observatorium is present. As its second pronouncement, this unit orders the operation of the lift system to be restored. As its third pronouncement, this unit confirms its authorisation to issue that order."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal enuncia solemnemente, acompañando cada palabra con comandos binarios:{/n} «Como primera declaración, esta unidad confirma que no existe ninguna amenaza de seguridad en este observatorium. Como segunda declaración, esta unidad ordena la activación del sistema de ascensores. Como tercera declaración, esta unidad confirma la autorización para emitir la orden anterior».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal spricht sehr feierlich, jedes Wort wird von binhären Befehlen begleitet.{/n} "Als erste Verkündigung erklärt diese Einheit, das aktuell keine Sicherheitsgefahr für das hohe Observatorium besteht. Als zweite Verkündigung ordnet diese Einheit an, dass der Betrieb des Liftsystems wieder aufgenommen wird. Als dritte Verkündigung bestätigt diese Einheit ihre Autorität, diesen Befehl zu erteilen."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal enunciates solemnly, accompanying each word with binharic commands,{/n} "As its first pronouncement, this unit declares that no security threat to the high observatorium is present. As its second pronouncement, this unit orders the operation of the lift system to be restored. As its third pronouncement, this unit confirms its authorisation to issue that order."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal spricht sehr feierlich, jedes Wort wird von binhären Befehlen begleitet.{/n} "Als erste Verkündigung erklärt diese Einheit, das aktuell keine Sicherheitsgefahr für das hohe Observatorium besteht. Als zweite Verkündigung ordnet diese Einheit an, dass der Betrieb des Liftsystems wieder aufgenommen wird. Als dritte Verkündigung bestätigt diese Einheit ihre Autorität, diesen Befehl zu erteilen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ağırbaşlılıkla konuşmaya başlayan Pasqal'ın her bir sözcüğüne ikilidil komutlar eşlik ediyor.{/n} "Bu birim, ilk resmî beyanı olarak şu anda yüce gözlemhane için herhangi bir güvenlik tehdidi olmadığını belirtmekte. Bu birim, ikinci resmî beyanı olarak asansör sisteminin devreye sokulması operasyonu emrini vermekte. Bu birim, üçüncü resmî beyanı olarak bu emri verme yetkisine sahip olduğunu onaylamakta."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal enunciates solemnly, accompanying each word with binharic commands,{/n} "As its first pronouncement, this unit declares that no security threat to the high observatorium is present. As its second pronouncement, this unit orders the operation of the lift system to be restored. As its third pronouncement, this unit confirms its authorisation to issue that order."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, ağırbaşlı bir şekilde konuşmaya başlıyor ve her bir sözcüğe ikilidil komutlar eşlik ediyor.{/n} "Bu birim, ilk resmî beyanı olarak, şu anda yüce gözlemhane için herhangi bir güvenlik tehdidi olmadığını belirtir. Bu birim, ikinci resmî beyanı olarak, asansör sisteminin devreye sokulması operasyonu emrini verir. Ve bu birim, üçüncü resmî beyanı olarak, bu emri verme yetkisine sahip olduğunu onaylar."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
